entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
